```{r setup}
library(hw3lm)
```

```{r}
set.seed(1)
x = matrix(rnorm(3*100), nrow = 100, ncol = 3)
y = matrix(rnorm(1*100), nrow = 100, ncol = 1)
res = linear_regression(x, y)
```



```{r}
lm_res = lm(y ~ x)
```

```{r}
sum_res = summary(lm_res)$coefficients
```



```{r}
sum_res
```



```{r}
res
```



```{r}
all.equal(res, sum_res)
```



```{r}
bench::mark(our_code = linear_regression(x, y), lm_code = summary(lm(y ~ x))$coefficients)
```
